title: Holiday Phrases, Church Complaints, MTH, Middle Aged Men and more.
itunes:title: Holiday Phrases, Church Complaints, MTH, Middle Aged Men and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! The originals are in the building and shots have been fired!. The sounds of a black Christmas party are here for you. The Jackpot Joint of Jerusalem has an issue with a hump in the back. Want to know why middle aged men are getting injured during sex? Fool #2 murders another one for the holiday season. There are rules for everything especially sidepieces during the holidays. How do you know if you have your priorities mixed up? Trash talking losers say certain things when their team is taking an L. There is a Christmas tree shortage and a possible solution. Today in Closing Remarks, Big Dog talks about success and the importance of stepping out of your comfort zone, plus more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
